verses.text: If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w or|strong="H3808"\w* dreamer \w of|strong="H1697"\w* dreams arises \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* proclaims \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w or|strong="H3808"\w* wonder \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*,

\w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* \w or|strong="H3588"\w* \w wonder|strong="H4159"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* spoken \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w comes|strong="H5414"\w* about, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* says, “\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* follow other gods (\w which|strong="H5030"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* known) \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* worship \w them|strong="H5414"\w*,”

\w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* listen \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* words \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w prophet|strong="H1696"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* dreamer. \w For|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1696"\w* testing \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w find|strong="H3045"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w whether|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* love \w Him|strong="H5647"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* soul.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w follow|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w Him|strong="H1931"\w*. \w Keep|strong="H8085"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* voice; serve \w Him|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hold fast \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H1931"\w*.

Such \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w or|strong="H8085"\w* dreamer must \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* advocated rebellion \w against|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H5647"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt \w and|strong="H3068"\w* redeemed \w you|strong="H5647"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* slavery; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* tried \w to|strong="H3068"\w* turn \w you|strong="H5647"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w* \w you|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*. \w So|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H5647"\w* must purge \w the|strong="H8085"\w* evil \w from|strong="H8085"\w* among \w you|strong="H5647"\w*.\f + \fr 13:5 \ft Cited in 1 Corinthians 5:13\f*

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* very own brother, \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* son \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1004"\w*, \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* embrace,\f + \fr 13:6 \ft Hebrew the wife of your bosom\f* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* closest friend secretly entices \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* worship other gods” (\w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w known|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3588"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* peoples around \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w whether|strong="H3045"\w* \w near|strong="H3808"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w far|strong="H5315"\w*, \w whether|strong="H3045"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* end \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w other|strong="H7453"\w*),

\w you|strong="H5704"\w* must \w not|strong="H5971"\w* yield \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w* \w or|strong="H5704"\w* listen \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*. Show \w him|strong="H5439"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* pity, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* do \w not|strong="H5971"\w* spare \w him|strong="H5439"\w* \w or|strong="H5704"\w* shield \w him|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w Instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H8085"\w* kill \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* hand \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* first \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* put \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* death, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w then|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

Stone \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* trying \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w turn|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Egypt, \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3027"\w* slavery.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* Israel \w will|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* afraid, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* never again \w do|strong="H3068"\w* such \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wicked \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. Idolatrous Cities to Be Destroyed

If, \w regarding|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cities \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* giving \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* inhabit, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*

\w that|strong="H3588"\w* wicked men \w have|strong="H3068"\w* arisen \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w led|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* astray, saying, “\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* serve other gods” (\w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w known|strong="H8085"\w*),

\w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* inquire, \w investigate|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* interrogate thoroughly. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w established|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w certainty|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H3045"\w* abomination \w has|strong="H3318"\w* \w been|strong="H5647"\w* committed \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*,

\w you|strong="H6213"\w* must \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w put|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* city \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sword. Devote \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7130"\w* \f + \fr 13:15 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering; similarly in verse 17.\f* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* people \w and|strong="H6213"\w* livestock.

\w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* gather \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* plunder \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* middle \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* public square, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w completely|strong="H3605"\w* burn \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* plunder \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* burnt offering \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* God. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* must \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mound \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w ruins|strong="H5892"\w* \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*, never \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* rebuilt.

\w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* devoted \w to|strong="H3068"\w* destruction \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* cling \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hands, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H6908"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* fierce anger, grant \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w show|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* compassion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* multiply \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* swore \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers,

\w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* obey \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w keeping|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* commandments \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* today \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w doing|strong="H3027"\w* what \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
